name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Albert BURTON, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, J J.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Albert BURTON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas denying Post-Conviction relief is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Allan M. Dabrow, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
339 A.2d 763
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Albert BURTON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 9, 1975.
Decided July 7, 1975.
Allan M. Dabrow, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, J J.
